TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UriSchemeKeyedCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedKeyedCollection`2<string, class System.Uri>

Docs.summary: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains URIs that are keyed by their transport scheme name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This collection is used by hosts to store base addresses for a service by scheme name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri[] addresses) cil managed

Docs.param: A variable length <xref:System.Array> of <xref:System.Uri> objects used to initialize the collection.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetKeyForItem(class System.Uri item) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Uri> whose key is being retrieved.
Docs.summary: Gets the key for a specified URI from the collection.
Docs.returns: The key for the specified URI from the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InsertItem (int index, Uri item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InsertItem(int32 index, class System.Uri item) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index that specifies the insertion location for the item in the collection.
The <xref:System.Uri> to be inserted into the collection.
Docs.summary: Inserts a URI into the collection at a specified location.
Docs.exception: The URI is not an absolute URI.
URI already contains a scheme name already in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void SetItem (int index, Uri item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetItem(int32 index, class System.Uri item) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index that specifies the insertion location for the URI in the collection.
The <xref:System.Uri> to be placed into the collection.
Docs.summary: Replaces a URI at a specified location of the collection with a new URI.
Docs.exception: The URI is not an absolute URI.
URI already contains a scheme name already in the collection.
